Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Hotel Pineta Palace in Rome, you'll be in the suburbs and close to Catholic University of the Sacred Heart and St. Peter's Basilica. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Gemelli Polyclinic and Istituto Dermopatico dell'Immacolata.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 210 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a rooftop terrace. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at Hotel Pineta Palace in Rome, you'll be in the suburbs and close to Catholic University of the Sacred Heart and St. Peter's Basilica. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Gemelli Polyclinic and Istituto Dermopatico dell'Immacolata.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Catholic University of the Sacred Heart - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Gemelli Polyclinic - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Istituto Dermopatico dell'Immacolata - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Rome Observatory - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Tribunale Ordinario di Roma - Sezione Penale - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Nature Reserve of Monte Mario - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Piazzale Clodio - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
San Carlo di Nancy Hospital - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
Villa Madama - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Vatican Gardens - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Pineto Park - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Vatican Museums - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Ospedale San Filippo Neri - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Foro Italico - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Casina Pio IV - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 19.4 km / 12.1 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 19.7 km / 12.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Pineta Palace is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text: Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.
